verbs.description: as trump disrupts jewish [V: mourning] [ARG0: pastor] reacts in viral videoas trump disrupts jewish mourning pastor reacts in viral video on tuesday reverend susan rothenberg protested loudly from her home as president trump drove past the scene of the synagogue shooting the pastor screamed that the president was disrupting a jewish mourning rite now she is receiving threats and harassment for speaking out susan rothenberg trump pittsburgh president
